page.title: 09Playground Poems 1
page.content:
Here are two poems written by 10 year old children about their playground.
{Tick Feeling like a rabbit being hunted for meat. Zooming past the people who are on. Like a great footballer dribbling past the opposition. Falling over and getting up as quick as a thunderbolt. Watching people getting ticked,like a Golden Eagle snatching a sick lamb. Running faster than an athlete doing the 100 metre sprint. Slowing down like a train at a station. Suddenly feeling a hand touch your back like a stone hitting you - you are on at last. {Jamie Towers
